headline: Got $5,000? These 3 Stocks Are Absurdly Cheap Buys Heading Into 2025
summary: The stock market enjoyed a strong year in 2024 as the S&P 500 hit new records.  If you have $5,000 you want to invest in stocks today, three excellent options are Pfizer (NYSE: PFE), L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX), and Dell (NYSE: DELL).  Pfizer is a big name in healthcare, but it's trading at a steep discount -- just 9 times its estimated future earnings (based on analyst estimates).
